meanings.definition: A rare earth oxide, Y2O3, used in certain ceramics and optical lenses.
meanings.sent1: The yttria enhanced the durability of the ceramic vase.
meanings.sent2: The optical lens was made with a special coating of yttria.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over a vase made of yttria, causing a mess.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like yttria under the bright lights.
meanings.sent5: The scientist carefully studied the properties of yttria under the microscope.
